thread.title: Excellent hotel in the middle of Theaterland!
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in the middle of Theaterland! - Review of Ameritania Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rosiw65
title: Excellent hotel in the middle of Theaterland!
text:
Everything about the Ameritania Hotel was excellent - all of the staff were extremely helpful and courteous, the rooms spacious and comfortable...I will definitely be returning.
Jeff on the door gets special shout out for being so helpful in every way!
